timeline.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: There is no check that this is below config.api.maxLimit or a default being set. Why are we not using parseLimitAndOrderParams?
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText:
I've update the validation method for limit to check the range.
Not using parseLimitAndOrderParams because it does validation and sql query creation in one go only for the limit param.
The logic I'm defining here and hoping will be used by other routes is to have all the queries and filters validated before trying to create the sql. This split up the logic and I think makes it easier to follow and test.
